title: Newly Renovated Hawkesbury River Stay with Daily Coffee & Welcome Wine
description:
Reconnect with the great Australian outdoors from the banks of the sparkling Hawkesbury River at this peaceful retreat, set on 45 acres near the rugged Dharug National Park and under two hours from Sydney. Relax from your refurbished room that's bursting with rustic charm, pick up a charcuterie board The Pantry for a picnic and stop by for a warming meal at the nearby Wisemans Ferry Inn Hotel, set in a charming heritage building established in 1827.

With an abundance of activities on offer, from hiking to tennis and fishing, this sprawling stay allows you to get back in touch with nature however you please. Spend days exploring the surrounding bushland, swimming in the outdoor pool or cooking up a storm with the onsite barbeque facilities.
offer_address: 5564 Old Northern Road, Wisemans Ferry, New South Wales 2775, Australia
